CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Referral_Source_Business_Type__c) , "Accounting Firm", "Bronze" , "Bank", "Bronze" , "Financial Services", "Bronze" , "Broker", "Financial Advisor" , "Broker Dealer", "Money Manager" , "Insurance Carrier", "IIA General" , "MSP Partner", "MSP Partner" , "Strategic Accountant Firm", "Bronze" , "Health Insurance Broker", "Bronze" , "Full Service Agency", "Bronze" , "PEO Broker", "Bronze" , "Property & Casualty Broker", "Bronze" , "Business Consultant", "Bronze" , "Other")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What default Referral Type do we set on Referral Contacts based on the Referral Source Business Type?
CustomField.label: Default Ctct Referral Type
